title: PSA: AP Miss Fortune mid is better than ADC Miss Fortune
body:
https://gyazo.com/7217671f09ecbb79bbd875821b604916

High D1/Master/Challenger level play, enjoy your feelo after her ADC version was predictably nerfed and turned into nothing but an ult bot. <3

replies.body: Shh, people will get this popular and rito will notice and beat it with the ban hammer to the ground.

> [{quoted}](name=YukiGamiteKureta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2o7vWAfa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-21T23:31:22.346+0000)
>
> Shh, people will get this popular and rito will notice and beat it with the ban hammer to the ground.

KappaPride

A lot of people would disagree with you but I actually totally agree with you. ADC Miss Fortune's base AD is so pathetically low that there isn't a reason to play her as an ADC aside from her ultimate really, and if she doesn't have a team built around her then it's almost impossible for her to do anything with her ultimate.
She lost like. 80 base damage on her E. They directly nerfed AP MF.
like there are doing to tank {{champion:84}}  right now
